# ShieldSettings.ActivityCategoryPolicy.all(except:)

**Case**

A policy that indicates the device shields all apps and websites, except content that you specify.

## Declaration

```swift
case all(except: Set<Token<Activity>> = [])
```

## Discussion

Your app can specify up to 50 application or web domain tokens exceptions at once.

## Shielding Categories

- **ShieldSettings.ActivityCategoryPolicy.none**: A policy that indicates the device doesn’t shield any content.
- **ShieldSettings.ActivityCategoryPolicy.specific(_:except:)**: A policy that indicates the device shields specific categories of activity, with some exceptions.
